commands.name: az iot du update calculate-hash
commands.summary: Calculate the base64 hashed representation of a file.

commands.name: az iot du update delete
commands.syntax:
az iot du update delete --account
                        --instance
                        --un
                        --up
                        --update-version
                        [--no-wait]
                        [--resource-group]
                        [--yes {false, true}]

commands.name: az iot du update import
commands.summary: Import a new update version into the Device Update instance.
examples: az iot du update import -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --hashes sha256={hash_value} --size {size_in_bytes} --url {manifest_location} --file filename={file1_name} url={file1_url} --file filename={file2_name} url={file2_url}
az iot du update import -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --url {manifest_location} --file filename={file1_name} url={file1_url} --file filename={file2_name} url={file2_url}

commands.name: az iot du update list
commands.summary: List updates that have been imported to the Device Update instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot du update list --account
                      --instance
                      [--by-provider {false, true}]
                      [--filter]
                      [--resource-group]
                      [--search]
                      [--un]
                      [--up]
examples: az iot du update list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --filter 'isDeployable eq false'

commands.name: az iot du update stage
commands.summary: Stage an update for import to a target instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot du update stage --account
                       --instance
                       --manifest-path
                       --storage-account
                       --storage-container
                       [--friendly-name]
                       [--overwrite {false, true}]
                       [--resource-group]
                       [--storage-subscription]
                       [--then-import {false, true}]
examples: az iot du update stage -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --storage-account {storage_account_name} --storage-container {storage_container_name} --manifest-path /path/to/manifest.json --then-import --friendly-name myAptUpdate
